# üé≤ Welcome to the Dice Game!

![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0-blue.svg?cacheSeconds=2592000)
![issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/EzekielCarvalho/restaurant-land-europe)

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](#)

![Dice Game banner](./dice_game_banner.png "Welcome to the Dice Game!")

> This is a two-player computer game application which involves trying to gain 100 points by any one player. It involves having to roll the die multiple times and to avoid rolling a one. The player can hold to collect the points obtained by rolling the die and add them to the main score, at which time it will be the next player's turn. If either one of the player manages to collect 100 points, that player wins and the game ends. 

![Dice Game GIF](./dice_game_gif.gif "Dice Game gif")

### üè† Visit the game here: [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Dice-Game-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://ezekielcarvalho.github.io/dice_game/)

## Key Features

* Two player game
* HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript used
* User-friendly


## Instructions

To check this game, simply visit the game at [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Dice-Game-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://ezekielcarvalho.github.io/dice_game/) and start playing!  

### GAME RULES

- The game has 2 players, playing in rounds
- In each turn, a player rolls a dice as many times as he whishes. Each result get added to his ROUND score
- BUT, if the player rolls a 1, all his ROUND score gets lost. After that, it's the next player's turn
- The player can choose to 'Hold', which means that his ROUND score gets added to his GLBAL score. After that, it's the next player's turn
- The first player to reach 100 points on GLOBAL score wins the game
